name: ZenCart Auto Installer
author: bislewl
description:
When building custom modules this file set helps developers easily create auto_installers for their modules 
 - Supports ZenCart Plugin Update Checks 
 - Includes Snippets to help with creating installer files 
 - Includes License needed for compliance on zen-cart.com plugins 
 
 **NOTE** 
 This is for developers/programmers and has no use unless you are building a module, or adding the ability to auto_install a current module
